title: gnomAD Browser
blurb: One of the most widely used open source, open access genomic reference population database. >200,000 pageviews per month.

title: GeniE
blurb: Empowers users to curate variant lists for rare genetic diseases.

title: CooksBooks
blurb: My groups' final project for Web Dev. A full stack Web App where users can create, like, review, and search for recipes.

title: Portfolio
blurb: A personal portfolio, in fact, this very site! Built with NextJS, TypeScript, and React, amongst other tech.

title: AllEars
blurb: An Ear Training application developed for Android, for my Mobile App Dev course final group project.

title: Sudoku Solver
blurb: A Python application that generates and solves Sudoku boards using a recursive backtracking algorithm.
